label: 三善道
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Also sanzenshu.  The heaven of desire, the human world, the world of fighting spirits.  We are reborn into the Three Good Paths as the result of good actions in previous lives. See rokudō (p. 336).　[三善趣、六道]
